ch.gbssg.app.ila.admin

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.gbssg.core.pac.AgentController
      • ch.gbssg.app.ila.admin.AdminController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAgentController

    public class AdminController
extends AgentController
    Represents the Controller for the Intermediate Level Agent Admin This agent is the Main Dialog for the User of the type Admin It handles all basic action which should be performed
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Michael Huber

      • editUser

      • addUser

        public void addUser()
        Create a new user. Create a empty User model and sends it to the Bottom level Agent User, for creating this object
